tool_description: Discover the world like never before with GeoGlobe Insights! Our powerful API empowers you to access comprehensive details about countries, states, and cities across the globe. Whether you're looking to limit your results, apply filters, or conduct precise searches, GeoGlobe Insights provides you with the tools to unlock a world of geographical information. Seamlessly integrate our API into your applications, projects, and services, and embark on a journey of data-driven exploration with GeoG...
name: GeoGlobe Insights
title: GeoGlobe Insights

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.description: List and search all the cities in the world

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort by any field available in city

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Get data from certain page, pages are generated based on limit and total records

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the records to be fetched

optional_parameters.name: state_name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by state name, Partials supported

optional_parameters.name: state_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by state code

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by country iso2 code

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Use [all] or select fields to return for each state [state_code, state_name, country_code,  country_name, latitude, longitude]

optional_parameters.name: country_name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by country name, Partials supported

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by city name

api_list.name: States
api_list.description: List and search all the states in the world

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort by any field in state

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Get data from certain page, pages are generated based on limit and total records

optional_parameters.name: country_name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by country name, Partials supported

optional_parameters.name: state_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by state code

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by country iso2 code

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Use [all] or select fields to return for each state [country_code, country_name, state_code, latitude, longitude]

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the records to be fetched

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by state name

api_list.name: Country by iso code
api_list.description: Get a country details by 2 letter iso code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geoglobe-insights.p.rapidapi.com/countries/pk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoglobe-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geoglobe-insights.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{iso2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoglobe-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: List or search for countries of the world. Get iso a2, a3 country code and localized country name and many other details.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Get data from certain page, pages are generated based on limit and total records

optional_parameters.name: independent
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country independence status

optional_parameters.name: un_member
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country if united nations member or not [true,false]

optional_parameters.name: borders
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country border, using countries iso3 code

optional_parameters.name: phone_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country phone code

optional_parameters.name: currencies
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country currencies, i.e. dollar

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country region, i.e. asia

optional_parameters.name: iso3
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter iso country code

optional_parameters.name: subregion
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country sub region

optional_parameters.name: capital
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country capital. Can be partial contains…

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Country name search string to filter countries. Can be partial contains…

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort record by any field [name, native, iso3, tld, capital, region, subregion, area, emoji, latitude, longitude, phone_code, demonym, borders, languages, currencies, un_member, status, independent, translations]

optional_parameters.name: translations
optional_parameters.description: Get selected name translations for each country, or use in fields to get all translations

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Set Limit for countries, default is 10 countries

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Use [all] or select fields to return for each country [name, native, iso3, tld, capital, region, subregion, area, emoji, latitude, longitude, phone_code, demonym, borders, languages, currencies, un_member, status, independent, translations,flag]
